title: Ada Veetukku Veetukku Lyrics Kizhakku Vaasal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
thala vaasalillaa veedum
oru thaalamillaa kooththum
thaththi tharigida
tharigida thathigina thom

Ada Veetukku Veetukku
vaasapadi venum.
theru kooththukkum
paattukum thalagadhi
venum

alai aadidum
aalkadal mattum
adhil muththai
edupppavan kattam
indha oorukku theriyadhu

ul manasula
aayira baaram
adhu paattula
odidum dhooram
idhu yaarukkum puriyadhu

onnillaama rendum illae
aanillaama pennum illae
pennillaama yaarum illae
thunbam illaa perum illae

vaasalillaa veedum
oru thaalamillaa kooththum
thaththi tharigida
tharigida thathigina thom

Ada Veetukku Veetukku
vaasapadi venum.
theru kooththukkum
paattukum thalagadhi
venum

pudhu maapula
ponnayum paaru.
rendum maadugal
poottiya aeru.
endrum vazhalum
pallaandu.

oru malligai
meththaya pottu
andha manmadha
viththaya kaattu
naan kaettkanum
thaalaattu

aadaiyillaa udalum illae
alaiyilladha kaddalum illae
osaiyilla maniyum illae
aaayillaa mmanasum ilae

vaasalillaa veedum
oru thaalamillaa kooththum
thaththi tharigida
tharigida thathigina thom

Ada Veetukku Veetukku
vaasapadi venum.
theru kooththukkum
paattukum thalagadhi
venum

thala vaasalillaa veedum
oru thaalamillaa kooththum
thaththi tharigida
tharigida thathigina thom

Ada Veetukku Veetukku
vaasapadi venum.
theru kooththukkum
paattukum thalagadhi
venum
